objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF2EF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFEBE5;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='frame-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FF7F67;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF6E54;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#FF6E54' stroke-width='5' fill='none' opacity='0.8'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#FF7F67' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M200 40 C300 20, 400 60, 500 40 C600 20, 700 60, 800 40 C900 20, 1000 60, 1080 40' stroke='#FF6E54' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/><path d='M200 1040 C300 1020, 400 1060, 500 1040 C600 1020, 700 1060, 800 1040 C900 1020, 1000 1060, 1080 1040' stroke='#FF6E54' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='rgba(255,111,79,0.03)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='rgba(255,111,79,0.05)'/><rect x='80' y='80' width='920' height='920' rx='10' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.7'/></svg>

objects.text:
65 Hours Playtime Wireless Technology
HiFi Stereo Sound 6 EQ Music Modes
Foldable Lightweight Design
Built-in Microphone for Calls

product_details.description: 🔥【Optional 6 music modes】Adopted most advanced dual 40mm dynamic sound unit and 6 EQ modes, BERIBES updated headphones wireless bluetooth red were born for audiophiles. Simply switch the headphone between balanced sound, extra powerful bass and mid treble enhancement modes. No matter you prefer rock, Jazz, Rhythm & Blues or classic music, BERIBES Bluetooth Headphones Over the Ear has always been committed to providing our customers with better sound quality as the focal point of our engineering . 🔥【65 Hours Playtime】Low power consumption technology applied, BERIBES bluetooth headphones with built-in 500mAh battery can continually play more than 65 hours, standby more than 950 hours after one fully charge. By included 3.5mm audio cable, the wireless headphones over ear can be easily switched to wired mode when powers off. No power shortage problem anymore. 🔥【All Day Comfort】Made by premium materials, 0.38lb BERIBES over the ear headphones wireless bluetooth for work are the most lightweight headphones in the market. Adjustable headband makes it easy to fit all sizes heads without pains. Softer and more comfortable memory protein earmuffs protect your ear in long term using. 🔥【Latest Bluetooth 5.3 and Microphone】Carrying latest Bluetooth 5.3 chip, after booting, 1-3 seconds to quickly pair bluetooth. Beribes bluetooth headphones with microphone has faster and more stable transmitter range up to 33ft. Two smart devices can be connected to Beribes over-ear headphones at the same time, makes you able to pick up a call from your phone when watching movie on your iPad without switching. 🔥【After Sale Protection】Package include a Foldable Deep Bass Headphone,3.5mm backup audio cable, USB charging cable and User Manual. Provide one year money back guarantee and three year warranty, lifetime worry free user support, contact us anytime if you have any questions about our wireless headphones bluetooth, we will reply within 10 hours. Brand - BERIBES ** Color - Orange red ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Headphones Jack - 3.5 mm Jack **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and tech-inspired promotional layout for wireless headphones. The design is anchored by a large, centrally placed product image labeled `product_image`, showcasing the headphones in a vibrant coral color. At the top, the prominent slogan `tagline` uses a futuristic and eye-catching font in a vivid orange-red tone. Just beneath, the main product title `heading` is bold and easy to read in dark grey. A concise feature list `description` highlights key selling points in smaller font. The price `price` stands out in bold orange-red, while a rectangular call-to-action button `cta_background` featuring the label `cta` encourages user interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #FFF2EF → #FFEBE5  
- Accent Border: #FF6E54 and #FF7F67  
- Primary Text (Headline & Price): #FF5A3D  
- Secondary Text: #333333  
- Call-to-Action Button: #FF5A3D with White Text (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a modern, stylish pair of headphones in a vibrant coral hue that instantly catches the eye. The dominant coral pink (#F2665E) is consistent across the entire headphone structure, giving it a unified and sleek appearance. Subtle highlights and shadows in lighter coral (#F88F87) and deeper coral red (#D44C45) enhance the dimensionality of the design, emphasizing its curves and forms. A soft matte finish provides a smooth texture, while the white text (#FFFFFF) and minor accent details like the blue LED light (#3C9EFF) make key features pop. This palette blends warmth, energy, and freshness, perfect for dynamic promotional banners.
